scripts.release: pnpm -r prerelease && bumpp && pnpm run publish
scripts.release:ci: pnpm -r prerelease && bumpp -y && pnpm run publish
scripts.release:beta: pnpm -r prerelease && bumpp --preid beta prerelease && pnpm run publish --no-git-checks --tag beta
scripts.release:local: pnpm -r prerelease && bumpp -y --no-push --no-tag --no-commit --preid local prerelease && pnpm run publish --no-git-checks --tag local --registry http://localhost:4873
scripts.cli: pnpm run build && rimraf /tmp/bati-app && node packages/cli/dist/index.js /tmp/bati-app
scripts.format: git ls-files | egrep '\.(json|js|jsx|css|ts|tsx|vue|mjs|cjs)$' | grep --invert-match package.json | xargs pnpm exec prettier --write
scripts.reset: git clean -Xdf && pnpm install && pnpm run build
